titles: Elizabetha quasi viuens Eliza's funerall. A fevve Aprill drops, showred on the hearse of dead Eliza. Or The funerall teares af [sic] a true hearted subiect. By H.P.
author: Petowe, Henry.
publisher: Printed by E. Allde for M. Lawe, dvvelling, in Paules Church-yard, neere vnto Saint Austens gate,
notes: In this edition, partly printed from the standing type of STC 19803.5, title page line 8 has "Subiect".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Elizabeth --  I, --  Queen of England, 1533-1603 --  Death and burial --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
